Shibi sends his insects underneath the opponent before springing them upon the enemy, feeding on their chakra. The technique isn't as effective if the opponent has chakra reserves which surpass the kikaichū's capacity to feed on said chakra.

[[es:Arte Ninja: Jutsu de Ilusión de Insectos]]
[[pl:Mushi Damashi no Jutsu]]
